sentences.en: a shady nook in the garden
A shady nook in the garden.
sentences.cn: 花园中荫凉幽静的角落.

sentences.en: Boxes are stacked in every nook and cranny at the factory.
sentences.cn: 盒子叠放在工厂的各个角落。

sentences.en: Every nook and cranny has been swept clean.
sentences.cn: 旮旮旯旯儿都打扫干净了.

sentences.en: Every nook and cranny on the familiar road and in my room.
sentences.cn: 在我房间里与熟悉的路上的每个角落.

sentences.en: Every nook cranny has been swept clean.
sentences.cn: 犄角旮旯都打扫干净了.

sentences.en: He explored every nook and cranny of science.
sentences.cn: 他钻研科学的所有犄角旮旯.

sentences.en: He knew every nook and cranny of the area.
sentences.cn: 他对这一带的一草一木都了如指掌.

sentences.en: I've searched every nook and cranny but I still can't find the keys.
sentences.cn: 我找遍所有的地方也没找到钥匙.

sentences.en: Seclude the reading nook from other parts of the room if possible.
sentences.cn: 如果有可能的话,最好把读书角和房间其他空间分开.

sentences.en: The breakfast nook had a built in table and seats.
sentences.cn: 早餐馆儿里有组合桌椅.

sentences.en: the party reached into every nook and cranny of people's lives.
sentences.cn: 那个聚会涉及到人们生活的方方面面。

sentences.en: the table in the breakfast nook
They searched every nook and corner.
sentences.cn: 他们把每个角落都搜遍了.

sentences.en: They searched every nook and cranny.
They wandered along the beach, looking in every nook and corner of the old camp.
sentences.cn: 他们在海滩上徘徊, 看遍了旧营址的各个角落.

sentences.en: We have this little coffee nook and we serve free coffee.
sentences.cn: 我们这里有个小咖啡座,供应免费咖啡.

trans.tran_cn: 角落，隐蔽处，每个角落，到处
trans.tran_en: a small space in a corner of a room
